content: As an AI language model, I do not have any information on the filming of a specific movie unless it is available in the public domain. However, in general, some common logistical challenges that cast and crew can face while filming a movie include adverse weather conditions, location problems, equipment malfunctions, scheduling conflicts, actor availability, and production delays. Additionally, specific challenges can arise depending on the type of film being made, such as special effects, stunts, or using animals in the production.
